text: Stanislav Valeryevich Timchenko (, born 11 January 1983) is a Russian former competitive figure skater. He is the 2002 Skate Canada International bronze medalist, 2002 World Junior bronze medalist, and 2001 ISU Junior Grand Prix Final champion. He retired from competition in 2004 and performed with Igor Bobrin's Ice Miniature Theatre in 2008. == Programs == {|class=wikitable style=text-align:center ! Season ! Short program !
